decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (EF/Location and 227/EF1 Received: 17/12/2014, Images of proposed external furniture Received: 17/12/2014 and 
Design and Access Statement Received: 09/03/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - No amplified sound or any music shall be produced or played in any part of the site outside of the building.

Condition : 4 - The outdoor seating area, herby approved shall not be put in place or used outside of the following hours: 0800-2300 Monday to Saturday and 0800-2200 Sunday's, Bank and Public Holidays. All tables, chairs and associated barriers or furniture shall be removed immediately outside of these hours.
description: Change of use of public highway to create external seating area
